---
name: Documentation Clarification
about: Request clearer explanation or report documentation errors
title: "[Docs]"
labels: documentation
assignees: oehm-smith

---

**What document or section is this about?**
Link to the specific page, section, or file (e.g., README.md, Part 3 of the article series, a template file).

**What's the issue?**
Select one:
- [ ] Unclear or confusing explanation
- [ ] Missing information
- [ ] Incorrect or outdated information
- [ ] Typo or formatting error
- [ ] Broken link
- [ ] Other (describe below)

**Describe the problem**
What specifically is unclear, missing, or wrong? Quote the relevant text if helpful.

**Suggested improvement**
If you have a suggested fix or rewording, include it here. Otherwise, describe what you were hoping to learn or understand.

**How did you encounter this?**
What were you trying to do when you hit this issue? This helps us understand the context.

**Additional context**
Add any other details, screenshots, or links that would help.
